article: Washington DC, the capital of the USA, is a beautiful city, but there are  many  poor and hungry people in it.  _  of them are even homeless . In the northwest of the city, there is a house  called  Martha's Table. Every day, a group of volunteers go there. They raise food, clothes and money  _  poor people. They prepare 2, 100 sandwiches, a lot of soup and cakes for about 500 people every day. They give the  _  to the homeless people. Mrs Morley is  _  of the volunteers. She looks after more than 60 children. She  _  them stories and teaches them  _  to read and draw. The children's parents have to work for many hours a day. They  _  take good care of them. So the parents are  _  that Martha's Table can help them look after their children.
